titles.title: Nursing School Clinics Act of 2009
A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of services provided by nursing school clinics under State Medicaid programs.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S59)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
1/6/2009--Introduced.
Nursing School Clinics Act of 2009 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of nursing school clinic services.
